thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 5 of 171
thread.title: Meredith Hanafi

author: Meredith Hanafi
title: Meredith Hanafi
text: I have used this service to book at least 4 pet sitters over the past two years. The site is so easy to use and I always get many responses within the first day of posting. The sitters I have used have all been responsible and reliable. I am also so happy to not pay so much extra money for pet sitting everytime we go away on a trip. This site allows me to go away more often with peace of mind and a huge financial savings.
